name: Mirrored (mastermagpie, danrotemp, kirstenmiller)
description:
Made in 7 Days for Dungeon Crawler Jam 2023

- W, A, S, D to move

- Q to look up at the hints in the sky

- E to interact with interactables

Created for Dungeon Crawler Jam 2023, under the theme of 'Duality', your objective in 'Mirrored' is to explore your environment, and through doing so, discover and aid in the cleansing of various spirits - interacting with them through the use of mirrors and resolving the individual puzzles they pose along the way.

We wanted to try and challenge the concept of a dungeon crawler by straying away from the usual environments that these games generally have. The game is intended as a metaphorical (and literal) reflection on various states of being, with the hope that, rather than seek solely to complete the game, it offers a moment of mindfulness for you, too.

Press '9' to return to start.
